author: undetermined
full_text:
This appears to be a job opportunities page for Code for Africa, not a fact-check article. The HTML contains multiple job postings for various roles such as Training Coordinator, Data Analyst, and News Editor. The content is primarily a list of job advertisements rather than a fact-check investigation. 

The job postings are for positions in various African countries, focusing on areas like digital democracy, misinformation fighting, and open-source investigation. Each job listing includes:
- Job title
- Location
- Brief job description
- Date posted
- Categories/tags

Would you like me to extract and summarize the details of these job postings?
title:
Hi, thank you for your interest in working for PesaCheck. 

Here are the current opportunities at Code for Africa which is PesaCheck's parent organisation: https://opportunities.codeforafrica.org/

All the best.
vclaim: This text does not contain any fact-check claims as it is a job opportunities page for Code for Africa listing various positions like Training Coordinator, Data Analyst, and News Editor.
